name: Borrowed Time (itch) (Weakest Imp, inferture, LittleFlameMan)
description:
Borrowed Time (itch) (Weakest Imp, inferture, LittleFlameMan) is a puzzle-platformer game developed by inferture, Weakest Imp and LittleFlameMan. It was originally released in 2019.
Borrowed Time (itch) (Weakest Imp, inferture, LittleFlameMan) is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
